name: Sarkonado
description:
TYPE DE JEU : FPS
GENRE DE JEU : Simulation
Activate 3 bombs to save Sarkocity from the Sarkonado. Avoid the dangerous Sharkozy and his minions !
A political satire game, prove that a bad movie can be a good game adaptation.

Made for: Make Something Horrible 2016
https://itch.io/jam/make-something-horrible-2016
